sense.gloss: to pull, to draw, to pull tight
to string (lines), to run (cable), to stretch
to pull towards oneself (e.g. someone's sleeve)
to drag, to haul, to tow
to take someone somewhere (e.g. a suspect to the police)
to tempt into joining, to strongly invite to join
to lengthen the pronunciation (of a word)
to quote, to cite, to reference

sdata.j: それに↑掴↑↓つか↓まって。↑引↑↓|ひ↓っ↑張↑↓ぱ↓る|ぞ。
sdata.e: Take hold of it. We're going to pull it.

sdata.j: この↑生地↑↓きじ↓は↑引↑↓|ひ↓っ↑張↑↓ぱ↓る|とすぐ↑伸↑↓の↓びる。
↑子↑↓こ↓ネコのしっぽを↑引↑↓|ひ↓っ↑張↑↓ぱ↓る|とはメアリーもいたずらっ↑子↑↓こ↓だった。
sdata.e: It was naughty of Mary to pull the kitten's tail.

sdata.j: ↑子猫↑↓こねこ↓のしっぽを↑引↑↓|ひ↓っ↑張↑↓ぱ↓る|なんて、おまえはなんていたずらな↑子↑↓こ↓だ。
sdata.e: It is very naughty of you to pull the kitten's tail.

sdata.j: ↑他人↑↓たにん↓の↑足↑↓あし↓を↑引↑↓|ひ↓っ↑張↑↓ぱ↓る|ようなまねはやめろ。
sdata.e: Don't stand in other people's way.

sdata.j: ↑他人↑↓たにん↓の↑足↑↓あし↓を↑引↑↓|ひ↓っ↑張↑↓ぱ↓る|ようなことはするな。
「これは↑何↑↓なに↓？↑供物↑↓くもつ↓か？」「そうだよ、このお↑賽銭↑↓さいせん↓↑箱↑↓ばこ↓の↑中↑↓なか↓に↑入↑↓い↓れて・・・この↑紐↑↓ひも↓を↑引↑↓|ひ↓っ↑張↑↓ぱ↓る|の」
sdata.e: What is this? An offering? "That's right. Put it in this offertory box ... and pull this rope."

sdata.j: ケモナーが↑集↑↓あつ↓まるイベントでは↑耳↑↓みみ↓や↑尻尾↑↓しっぽ↓を↑引↑↓|ひ↓っ↑張↑↓ぱ↓る|↑輩↑↓ともがら↓がいる。
sdata.e: At furry conventions, there are those who pull on ears or tails.
